name: 劉玉蓀
objective:
Discuss the digital modulation techniques and system  design. 
1. Introduction to digital communications
2. Signal power and power spectral density
3. Random Process and white Gaussian noise
4. Optimal detection rule
5. Fundamental  Passband digital modulation techniques (PSK, QAM, FSK, MSK)
6. Band-pass signal and systems
7. Orthogonal Frequency Division Multiplexing  (OFDM)
-
schedule:
1st week            Introduction to digital communication systems
2nd-3rd weeks        Signal Power & power spectral density
4th-6th weeks         Random processes & additive white Gaussian noise (AWGN)
7th week            Midterm exam
8th-9th weeks         Optimal detection rule
10th-13th weeks     Passband digital modulation techniques (PSK, QAM, FSK, MSK)
14th-15th weeks     Band-pass signals and systems
16th-17th weeks    Orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM)
scorePolicy: Homeworks (30%), midterm and final exams (35% each )
